BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Get one from @BotFather duh

API_ID_KEY.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

API_HASH_KEY.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

STRING_SESSION.description: You can get this by doing python3 generatestringsession.py on Linux and Mac, If on windows just python will work.

Lovely.description: Users who approve gbans, manage blacklist etc.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API key, get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account'

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the Heroku app name here (Must an exact same name with your input above).

Lovely_logs.description: In this group all scan request come

Lovely_approved_logs.description: When approved it sends a message there.

GBAN_MSG_LOGS.description: Where to gban user, Set to None and it will send /gban in Lovely_logs
